mapper.insert: INSERT INTO wishlists(wishlist_id, social_id, product_code) VALUES(wishlist_seq.nextval, #{social_id}, #{product_code})
mapper.select: SELECT w.wishlist_id, w.social_id, p.product_name, w.product_code, p.selling_price, p.brand, p.discount FROM wishlists w INNER JOIN products p ON w.product_code = p.product_code WHERE w.social_id = #{social_id}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM wishlists WHERE social_id = #{social_id} AND product_code = #{product_code}
